snippet: Jesse Ventura, the wrestling star turned Minnesota governor, objects to a book’s depiction of him as critical of the Navy SEALs.
abstract: Former Minnesota governor and pro-wrestler Jesse Ventura testifies in defamation suit he brought against estate of author Chris Kyle, former SEAL member who alluded to Ventura in his book, American Sniper: The Autobiography of the Most Lethal Sniper in US Military History; Ventura defends his military career, which he feels was besmirched by Kyle.

byline.original: By CHRISTINA CAPECCHI and MONICA DAVEY
byline.contributor: Christina Capecchi reported from St. Paul, and Monica Davey from Chicago.

lead_paragraph: Jesse Ventura, the wrestling star turned Minnesota governor, objects to a book’s depiction of him as critical of the Navy SEALs.

headline.main: Ex-Governor, Jesse Ventura, Matches Outsize Image in Court
headline.print_headline: In Court, Ex-Governor Matches Outsize Image
